mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(INST.STARTEDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') AS STARTEDDATE, INST.DEFNAME, COUNT(1) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM BPM_PROCINST INST INNER JOIN BPM_WORKLIST WL ON WL.INSTID = INST.INSTID WHERE INST.STATUS = 'Running' AND INST.ISDELETED = 0 AND INST.ISSUBPROCESS = 0 AND WL.STATUS IN ('NEW','CONFIRMED','DRAFT') AND SYSDATE-7 <= INST.STARTEDDATE AND INST.STARTEDDATE <= SYSDATE-1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(INST.STARTEDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss'), INST.DEFNAME
SELECT INST.DEFNAME, COUNT(1) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM BPM_PROCINST INST WHERE INST.STATUS = 'Running' AND INST.ISDELETED = 0 AND INST.ISSUBPROCESS = 0 GROUP BY INST.DEFNAME

SELECT INST.DEFNAME, NVL(COUNT(CASE WHEN DUEDATE <= FINISHEDDATE THEN 1 END),0) AS DELAYEDCOUNT FROM BPM_PROCINST INST INNER JOIN BPM_PROCDEF DEF ON INST.DEFID = DEF.DEFID WHERE INST.STATUS = 'Completed' AND INST.ISDELETED = 0 AND INST.ISSUBPROCESS = 0 AND DEF.OBJTYPE = 'process' GROUP BY INST.DEFNAME

SELECT INST.DEFNAME, TO_CHAR(INST.FINISHEDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') AS FINISHEDDATE, TO_CHAR(AVG(INST.FINISHEDDATE - INST.STARTEDDATE)+1) AS WORKINGDAYAVG FROM BPM_PROCINST INST WHERE INST.STATUS = 'Completed' AND INST.ISDELETED = 0 AND INST.ISSUBPROCESS = 0 GROUP BY INST.DEFNAME, TO_CHAR(INST.FINISHEDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss')

SELECT emp.empname, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN duedate > finisheddate THEN inst.instid END),0) AS passedCOUNT , CASE WHEN ROUND(AVG((finisheddate-starteddate)+1),0) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND(AVG((finisheddate-starteddate)+1),0),0) END AS passedDayAVG, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN duedate <= finisheddate THEN inst.instid END),0) AS delayedCOUNT FROM bpm_procinst inst INNER JOIN bpm_rolemapping rm ON rm.rootinstid = inst.instid INNER JOIN emptable emp ON emp.empcode = rm.endpoint AND emp.isdeleted = 0 INNER JOIN parttable part ON part.partcode = emp.partcode AND part.isdeleted = 0 WHERE status = 'Completed' AND inst.isdeleted = 0 AND inst.issubprocess = 0 AND part.partcode = #{partCode} AND #{searchFromDate} <= TO_CHAR(finisheddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(finisheddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{searchToDate} GROUP BY emp.empname
